tenant_gender.header: Which of these best describes the tenant's gender identity?

tenant_ethnic_group.header: What is the tenant's ethnic group?

tenant_economic_status.header: Which of these best describes the tenant's working situation?

household_number_of_other_members.header: How many other people are there in the household?
household_number_of_other_members.hint_text: The maximum number of others is 1

person_2_relationship.header: What's person 2's relationship to lead tenant

person_2_gender.header: Which of these best describes person 2's gender identity?

person_2_economic_status.header: Which of these best describes person 2's working situation?

armed_forces.header: Experience of the UK Armed Forces
Has the tenant ever served in the UK armed forces?

armed_forces_active.check_answer_label: When did they leave the Armed Forces?

answer_options.1: No - they left up to 5 years ago
answer_options.2: No - they left more than 5 years ago

armed_forces_injured.header: Were they seriously injured or ill as a result of their service?
armed_forces_injured.check_answer_label: Has anyone in the household been seriously injured or ill as a result of their service in the armed forces?

armed_forces_partner.header: Was the tenant the spouse or civil partner of someone who served in the UK armed forces?
armed_forces_partner.check_answer_label: Was the tenant the spouse or civil partner of someone who served in the UK armed forces?

answer_options.0: Yes - was the spouse or civil partner of a UK Armed Forces member and have separated within the last 2 years
answer_options.1: Yes - was the spouse or civil partner of a UK Armed Forces member who died within the last 2 years

medical_conditions.header:
Does anyone in the household have any of the following that they expect to last for 12 months or more:
  • Physical Condition
  • Mental Health Condition
  • Other Illness
medical_conditions.check_answer_label: Physical, mental health or illness in the household

pregnancy.header: Is anyone in the household pregnant?

accessibility_requirements.header: Are any of these affected by their condition or illness?

condition_effects.header: Are any of these affected by their condition or illness?

answer_options.condition_effects_vision: Vision - such as blindness or partial sight
answer_options.condition_effects_hearing: Hearing - such as deafness or partial hearing

tenancy_start_date.check_answer_label: When is the tenancy start date?
tenancy_start_date.header: What is the tenancy start date?

starter_tenancy.check_answer_label: Is this a starter or introductory tenancy?

fixed_term_tenancy.check_answer_label: If the main tenancy is a fixed term tenancy, please provide the length of the fixed term (to the nearest year) excluding any starter/introductory period
fixed_term_tenancy.header: If fixed-term, what is the length of the fixed-term tenancy after any starter period?

tenancy_type.check_answer_label: Type of main tenancy (after any starter/introductory period)
tenancy_type.header: What is the type of tenancy after the starter period has ended?

letting_type.header: Which type of letting is this?

answer_options.1: Another registered provider - includes housing association or local authority

property_relet.check_answer_label: Which type was the property most recently let as?

property_vacancy_reason.check_answer_label: What is the reason for the property vacancy?
property_vacancy_reason.header: What is the reason for the property vacancy?

answer_options.3: Relet - tenant evicted due to arrears
answer_options.4: Relet - tenant evicted due to ASB or other reason
answer_options.6: Relet - tenant moved to other social housing provider
answer_options.8: Relet - tenant moved to private sector or other accommodation
answer_options.9: Relet - to tenant who occupied same property as temporary accommodation
answer_options.10: Relet – internal transfer (excluding renewals of a fixed-term tenancy)
answer_options.12: Relet – tenant moved to care home
answer_options.13: Relet – tenant involved in a succession downsize

property_unit_type.check_answer_label: Which type of unit is the property?
property_unit_type.header: Which type of unit is the property?

property_number_of_bedrooms.check_answer_label: How many bedrooms are there in the property?
property_number_of_bedrooms.header: How many bedrooms are there in the property?
property_number_of_bedrooms.hint_text: If shared accommodation, enter number of bedrooms occupied by this household; a bed-sit has 1 bedroom

property_major_repairs.check_answer_label: Were major repairs carried out during the void period?
property_major_repairs.header: Were any major repairs completed during the void period?

property_major_repairs_date.check_answer_label: What was the major repairs completion date?
property_major_repairs_date.header: What was the major repairs completion date?

property_number_of_times_relet.check_answer_label: How many times has this unit been previously offered since becoming available for relet since the last tenancy ended or as a first let?
property_number_of_times_relet.header: How many times has this unit been previously offered since becoming available for relet since the last tenancy ended or as a first let?
property_number_of_times_relet.hint_text: For an Affordable Rent or Intermediate Rent Letting, only include number of offers as that type. For a property let at the first attempt enter '0'

property_wheelchair_accessible.check_answer_label: Is property built or adapted to wheelchair user standards?
property_wheelchair_accessible.header: Is property built or adapted to wheelchair user standards?

net_income.header: What is the tenant’s /and partner’s combined income after tax?

net_income_frequency.header: How often do they receive this income?

net_income_uc_proportion.check_answer_label: Benefits as a proportion of income
net_income_uc_proportion.header: How much of the tenant’s income is from Universal Credit, state pensions or benefits?

housing_benefit.header: Is the tenant likely to be in receipt of any of these housing-related benefits?

answer_options.0: Housing Benefit, but not Universal Credit
answer_options.1: Universal Credit with housing element, but not Housing Benefit
answer_options.2: Universal Credit without housing element and no Housing Benefit
answer_options.4: Not Housing Benefit or Universal Credit

rent_frequency.header: Which period are rent and other charges due?

basic_rent.hint_text: Eligible for housing benefit or Universal Credit

service_charge.hint_text: Eligible for housing benefit or Universal Credit

personal_service_charge.header: What is the personal service charge?
personal_service_charge.hint_text: Not eligible for housing benefit or Universal Credit. For example, hot water excluding water rates.

support_charge.hint_text: This is to fund housing-related support services included in the tenancy agreement

total_charge.hint_text: This is the total of rent and all charges

outstanding_rent_or_charges.check_answer_label: After housing benefit and/or housing element of UC payment is received, will there be an outstanding amount for basic rent and/or benefit eligible charges?
outstanding_rent_or_charges.header: After housing benefit and/or housing element of UC payment is received, will there be an outstanding amount for basic rent and/or benefit eligible charges?

outstanding_amount.header: What do you expect the amount to be?
outstanding_amount.hint_text: If the amount is unknown you can estimate

time_lived_in_la.check_answer_label: How long has the household continuously lived in the local authority area where the new letting is located?
time_lived_in_la.header: How long has the household continuously lived in the local authority area where the new letting is located?

answer_options.0: Just moved to local authority area

time_on_la_waiting_list.check_answer_label: How long has the household been on the local authority waiting list where the new letting is located?
time_on_la_waiting_list.header: How long has the household been on the local authority waiting list where the new letting is located?

answer_options.0: Just moved to local authority area

previous_la.check_answer_label: The LA in which household lived immediately before this letting
previous_la.header: Which local authority area did the household live in immediately before this letting?

previous_postcode.check_answer_label: Postcode of previous accomodation if the household has moved from settled accommodation
previous_postcode.hint_text: If the household has moved from settled accommodation immediately prior to being re-housed

reasonable_preference.check_answer_label: Was the household given Reasonable Preference (i.e. priority) for housing by the Local Authority?
reasonable_preference.header: Was the household given reasonable preference by the local authority?

reasonable_preference_reason.header: Why were they given reasonable preference?

answer_options.reasonable_preference_reason_homeless: Homeless or about to lose their home (within 56 days)
answer_options.reasonable_preference_reason_unsatisfact: Living in insanitary or overcrowded or unsatisfactory housing
answer_options.reasonable_preference_reason_medical_gro: A need to move on medical and welfare grounds (including a disability)
answer_options.reasonable_preference_reason_avoid_hards: A need to move to avoid hardship to themselves or others

cbl_letting.header: Was the letting made under choice-based lettings (CBL)?

chr_letting.header: Was the letting made under common housing register (CHR)?

cap_letting.header: Was the letting made under common allocation policy (CAP)?
